results.user_msg: Find recent arXiv papers about "federated learning" and give a short 2-sentence summary.
results.actual_text:
The recent papers on federated learning delve into enhancing security and decentralization. They cover integrating transfer learning for better security, asynchronous vertical FL for unreliable connections, and server-free FL for social networks. Additionally, decentralized FL with segmented gossip and methods to combat forgetting in non-IID data scenarios are explored.

Here are the top matched papers:
1. Federated and Transfer Learning: A Survey on Adversaries and Defense Mechanisms — https://arxiv.org/abs/2110.09206
2. VAFL: a Method of Vertical Asynchronous Federated Learning — https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.04140
3. Central Server Free Federated Learning over Single-sided Trust Social Networks — https://arxiv.org/abs/2112.11776
4. Decentralized Federated Learning: A Segmented Gossip Approach — https://arxiv.org/abs/2009.04384
5. Overcoming Forgetting in Federated Learning on Non-IID Data — https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.13775
